name: pnp-graph-connector-nodejs-javascript-solutiongallery
title: Ingest Microsoft 365 and Power Platform community samples using JavaScript and Node.js
shortDescription: This samples contains a Microsoft Graph connector that shows how to ingest sample solutions from the Microsoft 365 and Power Platform community sample gallery. It gives you a very convenient way to search for and reference community samples right from your tenant!
longDescription: This samples contains a Microsoft Graph connector that shows how to ingest sample solutions from the Microsoft 365 and Power Platform community sample gallery. It gives you a very convenient way to search for and reference community samples right from your tenant!
